function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Asymptomatic travelers exporting infection undetected across international borders","Impact":"Widespread transmission of the virus in receiving communities","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous testing and quarantine measures for all incoming travelers","Technologies":"Advanced testing technologies for quick and accurate detection of infections","People":"Travelers, local communities, and global population","Owner":"Government health agencies and international health organizations"},{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 to most countries on earth","Impact":"High infection rates and deaths worldwide","Mitigation":"Implement stringent public health measures, including social distancing, mask-wearing, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Vaccines, contact tracing apps, and remote monitoring technologies","People":"Global population","Owner":"Government health agencies and international health organizations"},{"Description":"Relaxation of restrictions and social distancing measures without proper precautions","Impact":"Resurgence of the virus and increased transmission","Mitigation":"Gradual relaxation of measures based on data-driven assessments and continued monitoring of infection rates","Technologies":"Data analytics for tracking infection rates, remote work technologies, and virtual communication platforms","People":"Government authorities, businesses, and the general public","Owner":"Government authorities and public health organizations"}]}
